name: Hallucinatory Item
flavorText: At your command, a phantasm of the item you’ve pictured in your mind shimmers into being before you. It wavers once, twice, and then seems to take on solid form.
text: You create the illusion of a single inanimate object that appears, to all intents and purposes, to be real. You can use this ritual to create an illusory wall, door, weapon, or other object.  Your Arcana check result determines the illusion’s maximum size.
